mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM map_Partner WHERE map_partner_id = #{_parameter}
mapper.update: UPDATE map_partner SET map_partner_name = #{mapPartnerName}, map_partner_address = #{mapPartnerAddress}, map_partner_latitude = #{mapPartnerLatitude}, map_partner_longitude = #{mapPartnerLongitude}, map_partner_thumbnailpath = #{mapPartnerThumbnailpath} WHERE map_partner_id = #{mapPartnerId}
